summary: A Nightingale amulet (Standalone & Replacer Versions Available)
descriptionHtml:
///Edit 30/03/12 - Standalone Version Uploaded, Sorry about the wait guys, New job and Super Busy RL. - More Amulets Planned.

Details
=======
A Nightingale themed Amulet - Standalone, Craft-able at forge.
Also Re-texture of the amulet of Zenithar Available as optional file.

Colour Maps DXT 1 512x512
Normal Maps DXT 5 512x512

The original was 256x256.

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\

Or use NMM

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.


Incompatibility
===============
Anything that replaces the Amulet of Zenithar (Only for Replacer Version )

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
Non Afaik, let me know if you find any!

History
=======
1.0, 2012/01/28 - Initial release.
2.0, 2012/03/30 - Second release Standalone.

Contact
=======
You can find me on TESNexus as Grace Darkling
You can send me on Deviant Art as Solace Grace


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating TES Series
Thanks to TESNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.


Tools Used
==========
Photoshop - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. 
 


My Other Mods
